meico.mpm.elements

Class Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.Global

  • public class Global
extends AbstractXmlSubtree
    This class interfaces the global information, as opposed to local, i.e. part-specific information.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
